clauses.title: Cleaning Services
clauses.body: The Cleaner agrees to provide cleaning services at [service_or_property] as follows: [detailed cleaning tasks]. Services will be performed [frequency] on [days/times]. The Client may request additional cleaning or one-time deep cleaning at additional rates agreed in writing.

clauses.title: Compensation
clauses.body: The Client shall pay $[fee] per [cleaning session/month] for the services, payable [payment terms]. Additional charges may apply for extra tasks, excessive cleaning requirements, or last-minute schedule changes. Payment is due within [number] days of invoice.

clauses.title: Service Provision
clauses.body: The Cleaner shall: bring standard cleaning supplies and equipment; perform services to reasonable standards; maintain insurance; and respect client property. The Client shall: provide safe working conditions; secure pets; and notify of special requirements or hazards in advance.

clauses.title: Damage and Insurance
clauses.body: The Cleaner carries liability insurance and will repair or replace items damaged by their negligence. The Cleaner is not liable for pre-existing damage or wear. The Client should secure valuables and inform of fragile items. Claims must be reported within [number] days of service.

clauses.title: Termination
clauses.body: This agreement continues until terminated by either party with [number] days written notice. Either party may terminate immediately for material breach including non-payment, property damage, or safety concerns. The Client pays for services rendered before termination.

clauses.title: Governing Law
clauses.body: This agreement is governed by the laws of the State of California.

annotations.tooltip: Procedure for reporting damaged items and insurance coverage details.
